articles.title: The next Made By Google event (better known as the Pixel launch) is set for August 20
articles.description: In a media invite Google sent to Engadget, it promised the event would feature new Pixel phones, watches, buds "and more."
articles.content: Google will host its next Made by Google event on August 20, the company announced today. In a media invite, it promised the event would feature new Pixel phones, watches, buds "and more." It's hard to imagine what other product types might be covere... [1130 chars]
